hanzi-su-wiki:
噴

Значения

Выбрасывать, извергать

Мнемоника

Венки из ароматных трав (утроенный крест) и драгоценных раковин 貝 с сильным запахом, от которого чихают и брызжет слюна изо рта 口.

Варианты

喷
purpleculture_pinyin:
pēn
to puff; to spout; to spray; to spurt
пыхтеть; изливать; опрыскивать; бежать

pèn
(of a smell) strong; peak season (of a crop); (classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)
(запаха) сильный; пик сезона (урожая); (классификатор по порядковому номеру урожая в разрезе нескольких урожаев)
rtega_mnemonic:
噴噴RS
喷喷		spurt, blow out, puff out, erupt, spout, emit, sneeze
  • something forging ahead 賁 from an opening 口
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 喷)
Pictophonetic: 賁 indicates the sound; 口 (mouth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
噴泉 [ pēn quán ]: fountain
噴發 [ pēn fā ]: to erupt; an eruption
噴射 [ pēn shè ]: to spurt; to spray; to jet; spurt; spray; jet
噴灑 [ pēn sǎ ]: to spray; to sprinkle
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 口 [ kǒu ] mouth; entrance, gate, opening
    • 賁 [ bì ] to forge ahead; energetic; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: History of Pompei: An unexpect eruption and from the mouths of the volcano spurts lava that threatens the farmers collecting haystacks in the fields and the fisherman catching shells on the coast.
heisig_constituent: erupt, mouth, pitchfork, haystack, ten, needle, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight, needle3, ten3
koohiiStory1: History of Pompei: An unexpect eruption and from the mouths of the volcano come lava that threatens the farmers collecting haystacks in the fields and the fisherman catching shells on the coast.
koohiiStory2: A bit nasty (but makes the whole thing much easier to remember) is to take the right side and call it a bearded clam. For erupt, you can make your own story about the mouth/opening on the left.
jp_example_words:
噴出(ふんしゅつ): spewing, gushing, spouting, eruption, effusion
噴火(ふんか): eruption
噴水(ふんすい): water fountain
WaniKani_Radicals: 口, 十, 艹, 貝
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: From your mouth comes a cross, some flowers, and shellfish. It all erupts from your mouth!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine these three things coming out of your mouth not one at a time, but all together like an eruption. Perhaps you're laying on your back, and they burst out of your mouth.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: When do inanimate objects erupt from your mouth? Mostly when you're having fun (ふん).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: It's really inconvenient that things erupt from your mouth whenever you're having fun. Makes it hard to have fun.
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 十 (десять), 口 (рот), 艾 (мокса), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese:
pēn: (глаг) брызгать, разбрызгивать; пыхтеть; чихать, фыркать
pèn: (прил/сч.слово/сущ) (диал., о запахе) сильный; урожай; в сезоне (об овощах, рыбе, фруктах и т.д.)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the decorations (賁) in the mouth (口) erupt out
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Kids like to spurt all sorts of things out of their mouths.  Even the chowder they are having for dinner!
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " mouth " and " ben ", it means (liquid, gas, powdery or granular objects, etc.) that they escape rapidly under pressure. "Zhuangzi·Qiu Shui": "Anyone who doesn't see her husband spit? The big one is like a bead, the small one is like a fog, and the others are countless.

" Squirt " also means (horse) hissing or puffing. "Said Wen": "Yeah. From the mouth, the beep sound. One said: Drum nose." "Warring States Policy‧Chu Policy Four": "So Ji screams, sings upwards, and the sound reaches the sky.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " mouth " and " ben ", it means that (liquid, gas, powder and granular objects, etc.) are escaping rapidly under pressure.
humanum_full_description:
從「口」，「賁」聲，表示（液體、氣體、粉粒狀物體等）受壓力而急速逸出。《莊子‧秋水》：「子不見夫唾者乎？噴則大者如珠，小者如霧，雜而下者不可勝數也。」

　　「噴」也表示（馬）噓氣或鼓鼻。《說文》：「吒也。从口，賁聲。一曰：鼓鼻。」 《戰國策‧楚策四》：「驥於是俛而噴，仰而鳴，聲達於天。」
humanum_short_description: 從「口」，「賁」聲，表示（液體、氣體、粉粒狀物體等）受壓力而急速逸出。

③量詞，指開花結實或成熟收割的次數：頭噴棉花。

從「 口 」，「 賁 」聲，表示（液體、氣體、粉粒狀物體等）受壓力而急速逸出。《莊子‧秋水》：「子不見夫唾者乎？噴則大者如珠，小者如霧，雜而下者不可勝數也。」 「 噴 」也表示（馬）噓氣或鼓鼻。《說文》：「吒也。从口，賁聲。一曰：鼓鼻。」 《戰國策‧楚策四》：「驥於是俛而噴，仰而鳴，聲達於天。」
From the sound of " mouth" and " ben", it means (liquid, gas, powdery or granular objects, etc.) that they escape rapidly under pressure. "Zhuangzi·Qiu Shui": "Anyone who doesn't see her husband spit? The big one is like a bead, the small one is like a fog, and the others are countless. " Squirt" also means (horse) hissing or puffing. "Said Wen": "Yeah. From the mouth, the beep sound. One said: Drum nose." "Warring States Policy‧Chu Policy Four": "So Ji screams, sings upwards, and the sound reaches the sky.

噴字的基本解释

噴
pēn

噴
pèn
均见“喷”。

噴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pēn］
［《廣韻》普魂切，平魂，滂。］
［《廣韻》普悶切，去慁，滂。］
“喷1”的繁体字。
(1)（液体、气体、粉粒状物体等）受压力而急速逸出。
(2)（马）嘘气或鼓鼻。
(3)指光线散射。
(4)犹扯。胡扯；闲扯。
[②]［pèn］
“喷2”的繁体字。
(1)见“噴2鼻”。
(2)气味浓郁。
(3)果品、蔬菜、鱼虾等大量上市的时期。
(4)量词。指开花结实的次数。
(5)指收成的次数。
[③]［fèn］
［《集韻》芳問切，去問，敷。］
“喷3”的繁体字。
吹奏。

噴字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　噴； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页211第06
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?普悶切，音溢。【說文】叱也。【玉篇】鼓鼻也。【廣韻】吐氣。【戰國策】俛而噴，仰而鳴。【莊子·秋水篇】噴則大者如珠，小者如霧，雜而下者，不可勝數也。【韓詩外傳】疾言噴噴，口沸目赤。【廣韻】與歕同。【集韻】或作?吩。　又【廣韻】?魂切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】鋪魂切，?音歕。義同。【廣韻】本作濆。潠也。　又【集韻】芳問切，音忿。吹聲。　又方問切，音奮。吒也。　【字彙】作噴，附十二畫，非。今攺正。噴从?作。

(4) Quantifiers. Refers to the number of flowering and fruiting.
(5) Refers to the number of harvests.

Name meaning

pēn, pèn
вм. 喷
Radicals: 口, 十, 艹, 貝  (mouth, cross, flowers, shellfish)
Meaning Mnemonic
From your mouth comes a cross, some flowers, and shellfish. It all erupts from your mouth!
Imagine these three things coming out of your mouth not one at a time, but all together like an eruption. Perhaps you're laying on your back, and they burst out of your mouth.
Reading Mnemonic
When do inanimate objects erupt from your mouth? Mostly when you're having fun (ふん).
It's really inconvenient that things erupt from your mouth whenever you're having fun. Makes it hard to have fun.
